alert.note: Alert for Northern Foothills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Southern Perkins; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 03 at 5:27AM MST until January 03 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern and southwestern South Dakota. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Slick spots could develop on roadways, especially on elevated surfaces such as bridges.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low-beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northern Foothills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Southern Perkins; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills
